Summary: One of the better Earl Greys
Text:
I bought this at a local store on clearance and was really pleased with the quality. It is far better than the tea bag varieties I have tried such as Twinings and Stash brands. I'd place it slightly higher than the Twinings Aromatics, which is a better quality than the yellow boxed Earl Grey version.

I've bought a high grade Rishi Earl Grey at a higher price from a tea store, but this organic version is as good and at a lower price.
